name: Journal de la Societe Pgrenologique de Paris (IAPSOP)
mytitle: Journal de la Societe Pgrenologique de Paris (IAPSOP)
content:
Journal de la Societe Pgrenologique de Paris (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Journal de la Societe Pgrenologique de Paris Summary  From Pat Deveney's database: Journal de la Societe Phrenologique de Paris. 1832--1835 Quarterly Paris, France. Language: French. Publisher: Societe Phrenologique de Paris, J.-B. Balliere. Editor: Re edige e par une commission de ses membres. 1/1, 1832-1835. 96-112 pp., 12-15 francs a year. The prospectus for the journal advises that its purpose is to expand phrenology beyond what had already been discovered and to make its value known and available to artists: it alone could guide the hand of the artist and the sculptor and bring rationality to their work. University of Chicago; Harvard; BNF. Issues:Journal De La Societe Phrenologique De Paris V1 N1-4 1832 Journal De La Societe Phrenologique De Paris V1 N2 1832 Journal De La Societe Phrenologique De Paris V1 N3 1832 Journal De La Societe Phrenologique De Paris V1 N4 1832 Journal De La Societe Phrenologique De Paris V2 N5 1833 Journal De La Societe Phrenologique De Paris V2 N6 1833 Journal De La Societe Phrenologique De Paris V2 N7 1833 Journal De La Societe Phrenologique De Paris V2 V5-8 1833 Journal De La Societe Phrenologique De Paris V3 1835
